programmes.show_description: Fantasy sequel with Christopher Lambert. Immortal Connor MacLeod's new-found happiness and settled family life are shattered by the sudden reappearance of his arch-enemy Kane.
Tense thriller. When a Vietnam veteran returns home from prison to discover that a violent biker gang has been harassing his family, he enlists the help of a drug baron in a quest for revenge.

A seven-year feud between two neighbours escalates and ends in court with incriminating video evidence of harassment and property damage.
When a man misses a few car payments on a car he bought with his ex-girlfriend, she reports the vehicle as stolen; the Judge sets her straight.
After a trip to Costa Rica, friends fight over unpaid travel expenses and unfair charges.
A woman accuses the father of her child of skipping out on car payments because she filed for child support.
When a child has scratches and a few too many bruises, a concerned father calls DCS on his son's mother; she says his claims were malicious.
A woman claims her horse was neglected, beaten and malnourished while in the care of her former horse trainer.
A man accuses his neighbour's horse of vandalism; she breaks down when he calls into question a Kickstarter for her cancer treatment.
When a woman allegedly threatens her landlord in an angry rant, he files a TRO; she claims she was forced to live in a car while her children lived inside.
A mother of eight, who was allegedly desperate to get her figure back, is sued by her ex-fianc√© for a plastic surgery loan and for false charges filed with CPS.

Cuckoo's Nest: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
With the help of SIO Pete Simm, Detective Inspector Steve Keogh leads us through the multi-layered investigation of the 2012 murder of beloved Christopher Proctor.
Well-known beauty executive Fabio Sementilli was sitting by his swimming pool when he was brutally stabbed to death.
When a prostitute is brutally murdered, her body is dumped in a waterway. Investigators find a tiny clue which could point to the killer.
The Alibi: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker helps a wrestler whose ex-wife is in hiding after witnessing a murder.
Action thriller with Owen Wilson. An American family moves to Asia, but faces a fight for survival when a revolution sweeps the country and the new government seeks to eliminate foreigners
Action adventure with Antonio Banderas. A disgraced Arabic nobleman exiled from his Baghdad home joins forces with Norse warriors to fight shadowy fiends at the end of the first millennium.
Historical action with Jackie Chan. When the corrupt Tiberius and his army arrive to claim the Silk Road, a Chinese general and a renegade Roman soldier join forces to stop him.
Action thriller with Luke Goss. A veteran cop and a call centre operator must put aside issues with their failed marriage and collaborate with a criminal mastermind when their son is kidnapped.

After a man notices bruises on his son's body, he files for a protective order and sues the mother of his child for legal fees.
A man is suspended without pay after an ex-lover allegedly calls his boss; he sues for defamation of character.
A beloved pet suffers a chest laceration after allegedly being attacked by another dog while on a walk.
A teenager having trouble at home is accused of stealing his sister-in-law's wedding ring and pawning it.
The Judge accuses a mother of covering for her mace-wielding teenager who sprayed a woman in the face at a hair salon.
Two cousins fight over an arrest and disagree as to whether it stemmed from a case of racial profiling or erratic driving and music blaring.
While a woman suffered in a comatose state, her son insists that he didn't take advantage of the situation by stealing her money and car.

This episode looks at the intriguing case of Kouri Richins, a children's book author who finds herself at the centre of a murder investigation following the death of her husband.
Florida, 1995, an elderly lady and her carer are murdered in a shocking home invasion. Earl Linebaugh and Melissa Harris are found guilty and sentenced to life with no parole.
Baby Dylan was three-months-old when his mother, Alexandra Tobias shook him to death. She claims it was an accident but was found guilty of second degree murder.
In 1997, eight-year-old Jamie Lavis went missing after playing outside, near Manchester. Family Liaison Officer Asif Hussain was assigned to support the family.
Christopher and Amanda Birks appeared to have a happy family life. When their house caught fire, Christopher and the children escaped, but Amanda didn't.

An unhappily married couple discover love on the ocean when they sail aboard a ship designed for honeymooners.
Sci-fi thriller with Jason Statham. A crooked prison warden coerces a falsely imprisoned convict into taking part in a high-octane race where convicts battle to the death in customised cars.
Fantasy thriller with Nicolas Cage. A vengeful father breaks out of Hell to hunt down the leader of a satanic cult who murdered his daughter and plans to sacrifice her child.
